mapper.sql: MallNo, PtNo, DrNo, DisNo, DrugStoreNo, MedOrderNo, OrderStatus, OrderTime, Phone, Address, PayStatus, PayTime, ShippingStatus, ShippingCompany, ShippingContext, ShippingNo, ShippingTime, OrderAmount, CreateUser, CreateTime, UpdateUser, UpdateTime, Version, Rental,ActivityDetail,OffMoney,Remark,PacketId
mapper.insert: insert into mallorder (MallNo, PtNo, DrNo, DisNo, DrugStoreNo, MedOrderNo, OrderStatus, OrderTime, Phone, Address, PayStatus, PayTime, ShippingStatus, ShippingCompany, ShippingContext, ShippingNo, ShippingTime, OrderAmount, CreateUser, CreateTime, UpdateUser, UpdateTime, Version,Rental,ActivityDetail,OffMoney,Remark,PacketId) values (#{mallNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ptNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{drNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{disNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{drugStoreNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{medOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shippingStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shippingCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shippingContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shippingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shippingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rental,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{activityDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{packetId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )

mapper.update:
update mallorder
PtNo = #{ptNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DrNo = #{drNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DisNo = #{disNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DrugStoreNo = #{drugStoreNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MedOrderNo = #{medOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OrderStatus = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OrderTime = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PayStatus = #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PayTime = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ShippingStatus = #{shippingStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ShippingCompany = #{shippingCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ShippingContext = #{shippingContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ShippingNo = #{shippingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ShippingTime = #{shippingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OrderAmount = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CreateUser = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UpdateUser = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UpdateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Rental = #{rental,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ActivityDetail = #{activityDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OffMoney = #{offMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PacketId = #{packetId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where MallNo = #{mallNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update mallorder set PtNo = #{ptNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DrNo = #{drNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DisNo = #{disNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DrugStoreNo = #{drugStoreNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MedOrderNo = #{medOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OrderStatus = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OrderTime = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PayStatus = #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PayTime = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ShippingStatus = #{shippingStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ShippingCompany = #{shippingCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ShippingContext = #{shippingContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ShippingNo = #{shippingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ShippingTime = #{shippingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OrderAmount = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CreateUser = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UpdateUser = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UpdateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Rental = #{rental,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ActivityDetail = #{activityDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OffMoney = #{offMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PacketId = #{packetID,jdbcType=BIGINT} where MallNo = #{mallNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select mao.MallNo, mao.PtNo, mao.DrNo, mao.DisNo, mao.DrugStoreNo, mao.MedOrderNo, mao.OrderStatus, mao.OrderTime, mao.Phone, mao.Address, mao.PayStatus, mao.PayTime, mao.ShippingStatus, mao.ShippingCompany, mao.ShippingContext, mao.ShippingNo, mao.ShippingTime, mao.OrderAmount, mao.CreateUser, mao.CreateTime, mao.UpdateUser, mao.UpdateTime, mao.Version, mao.Rental, mao.ActivityDetail, mao.OffMoney, mao.Remark, mao.PacketId from mallorder mao,medorder meo where mao.MedOrderNo = meo.OrderNo and DrNo = #{drNo,jdbcType=BIGINT} and meo.OrderStatus = 0
select * from mallorder where PtNo = #{ptNo,jdbcType=BIGINT} and PayStatus is not null
call generate_mallNo(@a)

select mao.MallNo, mao.PtNo, mao.DrNo, mao.DisNo, mao.DrugStoreNo, mao.MedOrderNo, mao.OrderStatus, mao.OrderTime, mao.Phone, mao.Address, mao.PayStatus, mao.PayTime, mao.ShippingStatus, mao.ShippingCompany, mao.ShippingContext, mao.ShippingNo, mao.ShippingTime, mao.OrderAmount, mao.CreateUser, mao.CreateTime, mao.UpdateUser, mao.UpdateTime, mao.Version, mao.Rental, mao.ActivityDetail, mao.OffMoney, mao.Remark,mao.PacketId from mallorder mao,medorder meo where mao.MedOrderNo = meo.OrderNo and meo.OrderNo = #{medOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select mao.MallNo, mao.PtNo, mao.DrNo, mao.DisNo, mao.DrugStoreNo, mao.MedOrderNo, mao.OrderStatus, mao.OrderTime, mao.Phone, mao.Address, mao.PayStatus, mao.PayTime, mao.ShippingStatus, mao.ShippingCompany, mao.ShippingContext, mao.ShippingNo, mao.ShippingTime, mao.OrderAmount, mao.CreateUser, mao.CreateTime, mao.UpdateUser, mao.UpdateTime, mao.Version , mao.Rental, mao.ActivityDetail, mao.OffMoney, mao.Remark,mao.PacketId from mallorder mao,medorder meo where mao.MedOrderNo = meo.OrderNo and mao.PayStatus = 0 and meo.OrderNo = #{medOrderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select mao.MallNo, mao.PtNo, mao.DrNo, mao.DisNo, mao.DrugStoreNo, mao.MedOrderNo, mao.OrderStatus, mao.OrderTime, mao.Phone, mao.Address, mao.PayStatus, mao.PayTime, mao.ShippingStatus, mao.ShippingCompany, mao.ShippingContext, mao.ShippingNo, mao.ShippingTime, mao.OrderAmount, mao.CreateUser, mao.CreateTime, mao.UpdateUser, mao.UpdateTime, mao.Version , mao.Rental, mao.ActivityDetail, mao.OffMoney, mao.Remark,mao.PacketId from mallorder mao,medorder meo where mao.MedOrderNo = meo.OrderNo and mao.OrderStatus !=3 and mao.DrugStoreNo = #{drugStoreNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and OrderTime between #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select mao.MallNo, mao.PtNo, mao.DrNo, mao.DisNo, mao.DrugStoreNo, mao.MedOrderNo, mao.OrderStatus, mao.OrderTime, mao.Phone, mao.Address, mao.PayStatus, mao.PayTime, mao.ShippingStatus, mao.ShippingCompany, mao.ShippingContext, mao.ShippingNo, mao.ShippingTime, mao.OrderAmount, mao.CreateUser, mao.CreateTime, mao.UpdateUser, mao.UpdateTime, mao.Version , mao.Rental, mao.ActivityDetail, mao.OffMoney, mao.Remark,mao.PacketId from mallorder mao left join ptinfo pt on mao.PtNo = pt.PtNo left join medorder meo on mao.MedOrderNo = meo.OrderNo left join medrecord mer on meo.MedRecordNo = mer.MedRecordNo left join drinfo dr on mao.drNo = dr.drNo where mao.orderStatus !=3 and mer.MedRecordStatus=0 and pt.PtNo = #{ptNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} and dr.drNo = #{drNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select mao.MallNo, mao.PtNo, mao.DrNo, mao.DisNo, mao.DrugStoreNo, mao.MedOrderNo, mao.OrderStatus, mao.OrderTime, mao.Phone, mao.Address, mao.PayStatus, mao.PayTime, mao.ShippingStatus, mao.ShippingCompany, mao.ShippingContext, mao.ShippingNo, mao.ShippingTime, mao.OrderAmount, mao.CreateUser, mao.CreateTime, mao.UpdateUser, mao.UpdateTime, mao.Version , mao.Rental, mao.ActivityDetail, mao.OffMoney, mao.Remark,mao.PacketId from mallorder mao,ptinfo pt,medorder meo,medrecord mer where mao.PtNo = pt.PtNo and mao.orderStatus !=3 and mao.MedOrderNo = meo.OrderNo and meo.MedRecordNo = mer.MedRecordNo and mao.PayStatus = 0 and pt.PtNo = #{ptNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} and mao.MallNo != #{mallNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select mao.MallNo, mao.PtNo, mao.DrNo, mao.DisNo, mao.DrugStoreNo, mao.MedOrderNo, mao.OrderStatus, mao.OrderTime, mao.Phone, mao.Address, mao.PayStatus, mao.PayTime, mao.ShippingStatus, mao.ShippingCompany, mao.ShippingContext, mao.ShippingNo, mao.ShippingTime, mao.OrderAmount, mao.CreateUser, mao.CreateTime, mao.UpdateUser, mao.UpdateTime, mao.Version , mao.Rental, mao.ActivityDetail, mao.OffMoney, mao.Remark,mao.PacketId from mallorder mao,ptinfo pt,medorder meo,medrecord mer where mao.PtNo = pt.PtNo and mao.MedOrderNo = meo.OrderNo and mer.MedRecordNo = meo.MedRecordNo and mao.orderStatus !=3 and mer.MedRecordStatus = 0 and pt.ptNo = #{ptNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and mao.PayStatus = #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select mao.MallNo, mao.PtNo, mao.DrNo, mao.DisNo, mao.DrugStoreNo, mao.MedOrderNo, mao.OrderStatus, mao.OrderTime, mao.Phone, mao.Address, mao.PayStatus, mao.PayTime, mao.ShippingStatus, mao.ShippingCompany, mao.ShippingContext, mao.ShippingNo, mao.ShippingTime, mao.OrderAmount, mao.CreateUser, mao.CreateTime, mao.UpdateUser, mao.UpdateTime, mao.Version , mao.Rental, mao.ActivityDetail, mao.OffMoney, mao.Remark,mao.PacketId from mallorder mao,medorder meo,medrecord mer where mao.MedOrderNo = meo.OrderNo and mer.MedRecordNo = meo.MedRecordNo and mer.MedRecordStatus = 1 and mao.DrNo = #{drNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select mao.MallNo, mao.PtNo, mao.DrNo, mao.DisNo, mao.DrugStoreNo, mao.MedOrderNo, mao.OrderStatus, mao.OrderTime, mao.Phone, mao.Address, mao.PayStatus, mao.PayTime, mao.ShippingStatus, mao.ShippingCompany, mao.ShippingContext, mao.ShippingNo, mao.ShippingTime, mao.OrderAmount, mao.CreateUser, mao.CreateTime, mao.UpdateUser, mao.UpdateTime, mao.Version , mao.Rental, mao.ActivityDetail, mao.OffMoney, mao.Remark,mao.PacketId from mallorder mao,medorder meo,medrecord mer where mao.MedOrderNo = meo.OrderNo and mer.MedRecordNo = meo.MedRecordNo and mer.MedRecordNo = #{medRecordNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select * from mallorder where ShippingStatus = 1 and PayStatus = 0 and DrugStoreNo is null

select meo.OrderNo as medOrderNo,meo.UpdateTime as orderTime, cpi.Name as name,meo.ExecUser as contact,meo.DrugStoreNo as drugStoreName, mao.ShippingStatus as shippingStatus,meo.OrderAmount as orderAmount from mallorder mao,medorder meo,ptinfo pti,cloudpassinfo cpi where mao.MedOrderNo = meo.OrderNo and mao.PtNo = pti.PtNo and pti.CloudPassNo = cpi.CloudPassNo and mao.PayStatus = 0

SELECT * from (SELECT mao.MallNo, mao.PtNo, mao.DrNo, mao.DisNo, mao.DrugStoreNo, mao.MedOrderNo, mao.OrderStatus, mao.OrderTime, mao.Phone, mao.Address, mao.PayStatus, mao.PayTime, mao.ShippingStatus, mao.ShippingCompany, mao.ShippingContext, mao.ShippingNo, mao.ShippingTime, mao.OrderAmount, mao.CreateUser, mao.CreateTime, mao.UpdateUser, mao.UpdateTime, mao.Version , mao.Rental, mao.ActivityDetail, mao.OffMoney, mao.Remark,mao.PacketId FROM mallorder mao,medorder meo where mao.MedOrderNo = meo.OrderNo and mao.ptNo = #{ptNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} and mao.drNo = #{drNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} and mao.payStatus = 0 ORDER BY meo.updateTime desc LIMIT 0,1) a GROUP BY a.MallNo

select mao.MallNo, mao.PtNo, mao.DrNo, mao.DisNo, mao.DrugStoreNo, mao.MedOrderNo, mao.OrderStatus, mao.OrderTime, mao.Phone, mao.Address, mao.PayStatus, mao.PayTime, mao.ShippingStatus, mao.ShippingCompany, mao.ShippingContext, mao.ShippingNo, mao.ShippingTime, mao.OrderAmount, mao.CreateUser, mao.CreateTime, mao.UpdateUser, mao.UpdateTime, mao.Version , mao.Rental, mao.ActivityDetail, mao.OffMoney, mao.Remark,mao.PacketId FROM mallorder mao,medorder meo where mao.MedOrderNo = meo.OrderNo and mao.ptNo = #{ptNo,jdbcType=INTEGER} and mao.payStatus = 0 ORDER BY meo.updateTime LIMIT 0,1
